entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-09-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • WSS Closure Immediately after KeepAlive #36308
  • DotNet watch should not trigger itself #36306
  • Replace `Microsoft.AspNetCore.Analyzer.Testing` with `Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Testing` #36300
  • Run Blazor Server app using dotnet watch, the second counter loses its state(resets count to 0) when IncrementAmount attribute is added to the first counter. #36299
  • SignalR Java client: disposing Completable returned by HubConnection.start() does nothing #36298
  • Startup improvement: fortunes #36295
  • Startup regression: json #36294
  • If-None-Match and If-Modified-Since headers not being process by .NET 6 on VS 2022 #36291
  • Custom app_offline.htm #36289
  • Fix bootstrap version validation in identity ui #36288
    6.0-rc2
  • Blazor WebAssembly .Net Core Hosted - Delete temp file after its downloaded to the browser #36282
  • ControllerEndpointRoute API Comment Misunderstood #36279
  • AuthenticationMiddleware should probably try all Schemes not just the default one. #36278
    Discussions
  • ASP.NET Core SignalR C++ Client 32bit #36276
  • Kestrel hangs #36274
  • An extended HTML custom element is not activated when anything in that subtree is Blazor-controlled #36269
  • dotnet watch hot reload doesn't apply changes to hosted wasm client project #36266
  • Error using a generated razor class in any other class #36265
  • Startup improvement: multiple_queries, plaintext #36264
  • Startup regression: json #36263

Closed

  • 5.0 docs: "SslProtocols" and "ClientCertificateMode" settable via config #26246
    6.0-rc2
  • Move OpenAPI extension methods out of MVC assembly #35905
    6.0-rc2
  • Reduce allocation for OnPrepareResponse event in StaticFile Middleware #36210
  • I set the BlazorWebAssemblyLoadAllGlobalizationData property to true but not working after publish in .net 6 preview 7 #35338
    6.0-rc2
  • An item with the same key has already been added. Key: Content-Language when using UseRequestLocalization and UseStatusCodePagesWithReExecute #36105
  • Blazor - RuntimeError: memory access out of bounds #36135
    Discussions
  • [Blazor] Update bundle generation to use Webpack 5 #29904
    6.0-rc2
  • Build error throws when running dotnet pack with multiple target framework #30427
    6.0-rc2
  • Error running signalr in google app engine #36249
  • dotnet watch hot reload not working in default WebAssembly Hosted project template (RC2) #36218
    6.0-rc2
  • Have kestrel filter out pseudo headers #30417
    6.0-rc2
  • When launching WebAssembly hosted app from VS2022 Pre5, changes are not shown #36225
    6.0-rc2
  • Blazor WASM: Upgrading to .NET 6 preview 7 breaks localization #35459
    6.0-rc2
  • Performance issue on for / loop in Blazor WASM #36095
  • OnTypeFormatting "on enter" can result in funky C# formatting #34319
    17.0-Preview5
  • Is it possible to configure the exception data to log in Log<Level> methods? #36262
    Discussions
  • Startup improvement: json #36217
  • Startup regression: json #36244
  • Perf improvement: json #36243

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/6.0] Move OpenAPI extensions to routing assembly #36310
  • PR benchmarks #36309
  • Un-redact safe request/response headers in HttpLoggingMiddleware #36307
    area-runtime
  • Correct the docs on ISession.IsAvailable #36301
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview1
  • Unquarantine test #36297
    area-runtime
  • Blazor Request Localization Updates Culture for All Threads #36259
    area-runtime

Merged

  • [release/3.1] Expose all references when not restoring #33197
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 3.1.20
  • Move OpenAPI extensions to routing assembly #36161
    api-approved, area-web-frameworks, 7.0-preview1
  • Support platforms where crossgen2 is not available #35916
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution, 7.0-preview1
  • [release/6.0] Use ArrayPool as default pool fallback #36253
    area-runtime, 6.0-rc2
  • [release/6.0] Make DataProtection warnings mention aka.ms/dataprotectionwarning #36292
    area-dataprotection, 6.0-rc2
  • [release/6.0] Update facebook oauth to v11.0 #36293
    area-security, 6.0-rc2
  • Make DataProtection warnings mention aka.ms/dataprotectionwarning #36174
    area-dataprotection, 7.0-preview1
  • [release/6.0] Have kestrel filter out pseudo headers #36287
    area-runtime, 6.0-rc2
  • Update facebook oauth to v11.0 #36284
    area-security, 7.0-preview1
  • Update branding for 3.1.20 #36235
    area-infrastructure
  • Update sdk to 7.0.100-alpha.1.21457.7 #36285
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview1
  • Have kestrel filter out pseudo headers #36166
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview1
  • [main] Fix templates #36283
    7.0-preview1
  • [release/6.0] [Static web assets] Fix casing issues during parsing #36228
    area-mvc, 6.0-rc2
  • [Blazor] Update npm dependencies (#36088) #36273
    6.0-rc2
  • [release/6.0] Fix root '<PageTitle>' not working when a default, static '<title>' is provided #36099
    area-blazor, 6.0-rc2
  • Backport #36207 to 6.0 #36247
    area-blazor, 6.0-rc2
  • Fix templates #36255
    community-contribution, 6.0-rc2
  • [release/6.0] Update sdk to 6.0.100-rc.2.21457.23 #36260
    area-infrastructure, 6.0-rc2
  • [Blazor] Update npm dependencies #36088
    area-blazor, 7.0-preview1
  • Update sdk to 6.0.100-rc.2.21457.23 #36257
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview1

Updated

  • Add analyzer for detecting mismatched endpoint parameter optionality #36154
    area-web-frameworks
  • Add build troubleshooting suggestion #36178
    area-infrastructure
  • Dispose the prior response on retry #36162
    area-runtime, feature-httpclientfactory, 7.0-preview1
  • Add Win11 helix-matrix/quarantine queue, remove win7/8 #36040
    area-infrastructure
  • [release/3.1] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `2d924d7` to `955c7f8` #36021
    area-infrastructure
  • [release/3.1] Align CODEOWNERS with 'main' #35950
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode
  • Update branding for 5.0.11 #36236
    area-infrastructure
  • [release/6.0] Added coverage for developer exception page #35786
    area-runtime, tell-mode
  • Improve error messages for missing body and services #36064
    area-runtime, api-approved, area-web-frameworks
  • Initial Bootstrap v4 SxS support #35981
    area-identity
  • sealed internal classes in default builder #36043
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Fix Blazor Server Reconnection Mechanism #36126
    area-signalr, area-blazor
  • [release/6.0 Cleanup remaining SSP references #36248
    area-infrastructure
  • Jmprieur/fix web api templates #36130
    area-mvc, community-contribution, feature-templates
  • Linux: Fix nested group resolution for RBAC claims #35279
    area-security, community-contribution
